00031 bool LocalDataInputStream::read(void* target, unsigned long amount)
00032 {
00033     if (isOpen() == false)
00034     {
00035 
00036         return false;
00037 
00038     }
00039 
00040     if (fread(target, amount, 1, m_fileInputStream) != 1)
00041     {
00042         return false;

00044 
00045     return true;

00061 bool LocalDataInputStream::open(bool textMode)
00062 {
00063 
00064     if (isOpen()) return false;
00065     if (m_localDataFilePath == 0) return false;
00066 
00067     if (textMode)
00068         m_fileInputStream = fopen(m_localDataFilePath, "r");
00069     else
00070         m_fileInputStream = fopen(m_localDataFilePath, "rb");
00071 
00072     if (m_fileInputStream != 0)
00073     {
00074         return true;
00075     }
00076 
00077     return false;
00078 }

00085 
00086         return true;
00087 
00088     }
00089 
00090     return false;

00093 bool LocalDataInputStream::skip(unsigned long bytes)
00094 {
00095 
00096     //Check the file is open
00097     if (isOpen() == false) return false;
00098 
00099     if ( fseek( m_fileInputStream, bytes, SEEK_CUR) != 0)
00100     {
00101         //Error seeking, return a bad result
00102         return false;
00103     }
00104 
00105     //Otherwise it seeked fine
00106     return true;
00107 }

00109 bool LocalDataInputStream::rewind(unsigned long bytes)
00110 {
00111     //Check if the file is open
00112     if (isOpen() == false) return false;
00113 
00114     if ( fseek( m_fileInputStream, -bytes, SEEK_CUR) != 0)
00115     {
00116         return false;
00117     }
00118 
00119     return true;
